User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the Philos application.

company.description: The company the user belongs to. Auto-populated from the organization hierarchy.

department.description: The department the user belongs to. Deprecated in favor of organizationId.

organizationId.description: A reference to the ID of the organization (department, etc.) the user belongs to in the 'organizations' collection.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the user's avatar image.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the user was last updated.

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: Represents a hierarchical organizational unit like a company or department.

name.description: The name of the organizational unit.

type.description: The type of the organizational unit.

parentId.description: The ID of the parent unit. Null for top-level organizations (e.g., the holding company).

order.description: The display order of the organization within its parent.

managerUids.description: An array of user UIDs who are designated as managers for this organization's goals.

ExecutiveMessage.title: Executive Message
ExecutiveMessage.description: A message from the executive team.

authorName.description: The display name of the author.

likesCount.description: Aggregated number of likes from the 'likes' subcollection.

commentsCount.description: Aggregated number of comments from the 'comments' subcollection.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A comment on a post or message.

authorName.description: Display name of the comment's author.

parentCommentId.description: ID of the parent comment if this is a reply. Null for top-level comments.

Like.title: Like
Like.description: Represents a 'like' action from a user on an item.

userId.description: The UID of the user who liked the item.

likedAt.description: Timestamp of when the like was given.

src.description: URL to the video file in Cloud Storage.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL to the video thumbnail image.

likesCount.description: Aggregated number of likes from the 'likes' subcollection.

commentsCount.description: Aggregated number of comments from the 'comments' subcollection.

PhilosophyItem.title: Philosophy Item
PhilosophyItem.description: A single item representing a company philosophy, vision, or value.

content.description: The detailed content of the item.

icon.description: The name of the Lucide icon to display.

order.description: A number to determine the display order.

CalendarDisplaySettings.title: Calendar Display Settings
CalendarDisplaySettings.description: Settings for how content is displayed on the user-facing calendar.

dailyLoopCounter.description: A counter to keep track of the current item in the 'daily' rotation.

lastUpdatedDate.description: The last date the dailyLoopCounter was updated. Used to ensure the counter increments only once per day.

CalendarMessage.title: Calendar Message
CalendarMessage.description: A single message for the 'daily' calendar rotation.

content.description: Can contain HTML from rich text editor.

order.description: Display order for the daily loop.

authorId.description: The UID of the author who created the message.

authorName.description: The display name of the author.

FixedCalendarMessage.title: Fixed Calendar Message
FixedCalendarMessage.description: A message scheduled to be displayed for a specific date range.

content.description: Can contain HTML from rich text editor.

startDate.description: The start date for the display period.

endDate.description: The end date for the display period.

order.description: Display priority if dates overlap. Lower is higher.

authorId.description: The UID of the author who created the message.

authorName.description: The display name of the author.

Goal.title: Goal
Goal.description: Represents a goal for a company, team, or individual.

scopeId.description: ID of the company, team, or user organization.

kpi.description: (Company goals only) Key Performance Indicator identifier.

fiscalYear.description: (Company goals only) The fiscal year this goal applies to.

fiscalYearStartMonth.description: (Company goals only) The starting month of the fiscal year.

startDate.description: (Team goals only) The start date of the goal period.

endDate.description: (Team goals only) The end date of the goal period.

targetValue.description: (Team goals - donut chart only) The overall target value for the period.

currentValue.description: (Team goals - donut chart only) The current progress value.

unit.description: (Team goals only) The unit for the goal values (e.g., '%', '件', '円').

defaultGranularity.description: Default time granularity for chart display.

GoalRecord.title: Goal Record
GoalRecord.description: Stores a time-series data point for a team goal.

date.description: The specific date this record applies to.

targetValue.description: The target value for this specific date/period.

actualValue.description: The actual achieved value for this specific date/period.

authorId.description: UID of the user who last updated this record.

PersonalGoal.title: Personal Goal
PersonalGoal.description: Represents an individual user's personal goal.

startDate.description: The start date of the goal period.

endDate.description: The end date of the goal period.

progress.description: The progress of the goal, from 0 to 100.

isPublic.description: Whether the goal is visible to other users.

status.description: The current status of the goal.

SalesRecord.title: Sales Record
SalesRecord.description: Stores monthly sales target and actual data for a specific goal.

ProfitRecord.title: Profit Record
ProfitRecord.description: Stores monthly operating profit and sales revenue for a specific goal.

CustomerRecord.title: Customer Record
CustomerRecord.description: Stores monthly total customer count for a specific goal.

ProjectComplianceRecord.title: Project Compliance Record
ProjectComplianceRecord.description: Stores monthly project delivery compliance data.

counts.description: Stores the number of projects for each compliance category.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Defines the set of permissions associated with a user role.

name.description: The display name of the role (e.g., '管理者', '経営層').

permissions.description: A list of permission keys that this role grants.

UserPermission.title: User Permission
UserPermission.description: Stores a complete list of permissions for a specific user, which overrides any role-based permissions.

userId.description: The UID of the user to whom the permissions are applied. This should match the document ID.

permissions.description: A complete list of permission keys that this user has. If this document exists, their role permissions are ignored.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the permissions were last updated.

updatedBy.description: The UID of the administrator who last updated these permissions.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores profile information for each user, keyed by their Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/personalGoals/{goalId}.description: Stores personal goals for each user in a subcollection.

/organizations/{organizationId}.description: Stores all organizational units in a flat structure, enabling hierarchical representation via parentId.

/executiveMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages from the executive team.

/executiveMessages/{messageId}/likes/{us.description: Stores likes on executive messages, keyed by user UID.

/videos/{videoId}/likes/{userId}.description: Stores likes on videos, keyed by user UID.

/philosophy/{philosophyId}.description: Stores company philosophy, vision, and value items.

/settings/calendarDisplay.description: Stores the display settings for the user-facing calendar.

/calendarMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores messages for the daily calendar rotation.

/fixedCalendarMessages/{messageId}.description: Stores scheduled messages for specific date ranges.

/goals/{goalId}/salesRecords/{recordId}.description: Subcollection storing monthly sales records for a specific goal.

/goals/{goalId}/profitRecords/{recordId}.description: Subcollection storing monthly profit records for a specific goal.

/goals/{goalId}/customerRecords/{recordI.description: Subcollection storing monthly customer records for a specific goal.

/goals/{goalId}/projectComplianceRecords.description: Subcollection storing monthly project compliance records for a specific goal.

/goals/{goalId}/goalRecords/{recordId}.description: Subcollection storing time-series records for a specific team goal.

/roles/{roleId}.description: Stores the default permissions for each user role (admin, executive, etc.).

/user_permissions/{userId}.description: Stores individual permission overrides for specific users, keyed by their UID. If a document exists for a user here, it completely overrides their role-based permissions.
